# Jake (Porsche's Picks) — Partnership Terms — October 30, 2025

---

## Community Acquisition Structure

- Jake's Porsche's Picks Real Sports group migrates into DD Discord
- Jake joins as staff: community partner + picks analyst (Porsche's Picks channel)
- Younger demographic (16–21) — not all immediately eligible for partner conversions but valuable for community base and future conversion as they age up
- Goal: Jake's members make DD their permanent home for sports discussion

## Conversion Process

- Members message Jake or post in server requesting free premium access
- Real community offer: **30 free days** of all-access (vs. standard 7 days) for first partner conversion
- Ongoing: standard 7 free days per additional partner conversion
- Focus is partner conversions, not premium subscriptions

## Attribution

- Jake submits in dedicated mod channel: partner name (text) + screenshot of member using DD code + screenshot of successful eligible deposit
- Example: message "Parlay Play" and attach screenshot
- Dax runs end-of-month count of all Jake's attributions
- Partner priority ranking: Dax to provide ordered list by CPA value (e.g. Sleeper $75 > Boom Fantasy $35)

## Compensation

- Specific rate TBD — finalized in contract (not in job description)
- Job description is a reference document only, no signatures, no payment details
- Contract will include payment terms and require both signatures
